root.name: Blades of Fury
root.description: Main StorylineIt is the 13th Century (1266, to be exact). War breaks out over a suit of armor that is said to provide invulnerability to whoever wears it. Numerous warriors fight one another over this armor, and the fate of the world depends on the winner of this deadly competition...List of Characters:Starting CharactersArthurElvynSkurdSkornMachiavelUnlockable CharactersFaustDiabloMagnusEnimia
